tokentrading
Class GlobalTokenTrader

java.lang.Object
  tokentrading.TokenTrader
      tokentrading.GlobalTokenTrader

public class GlobalTokenTrader
extends TokenTrader

This version of TokenTrader implements a global token trader strategy The global policy that we chose to implement is to ensure that gates always have least 3 tokens. Thus, gates will never trade below three tokens, and will always request to have 3 more tokens.

Constructor Summary
GlobalTokenTrader(Gate tokenTrader)
          Creates a TokenTrader which is responsible for a given gate and implements our global policy

 int onTokenRequestReceived()
          Gets how many tokens to send when a token request is received.
 int requestTokens()
          Gets the number of tokens that should be requested by a given gate This number is decided based on the number of tokens a gate currently has and the particular polciy

onTokenRequestReceived

public int onTokenRequestReceived()
Description copied from class: TokenTrader
Gets how many tokens to send when a token request is received. Uses the current number of tokens that the gate has as a baseline along with the particular policy

Specified by:
onTokenRequestReceived in class TokenTrader
Returns:
The number of tokens that the gate should send to whoever sent the token request

Description copied from class: TokenTrader
Gets the number of tokens that should be requested by a given gate This number is decided based on the number of tokens a gate currently has and the particular polciy

Specified by:

Returns:
The number of tokens that this gate needs to request
